Header: Gotabhaya’s revision petition postponed for 04 Aug.
Content: The revision petition filed by former Defence Secretary Gotabhaya Rajapaksa was taken up in the Appeals Court today. He is seeking the suspension of the cases filed in the Colombo Chief Magistrate’s Court with respect to the Avant Garde transaction. Gotabhaya Rajapaksa’s Counsel presented oral submissions while the oral submissions of the Attorney General was postponed for the 04th of next month.
